title: Sleeve Bands (China), 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on leno weave
description: Allover fret forming tangent geometric medallions in multicolored silk in form of Florentine stitch on undyed silk leno ground. Sleeve bands are joined down one long side to make rectangular panel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sleeve Bands (China), 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on leno weave. 
1953-68-1.
